For general information, please visit the website of the [Marketing Institute (HU Berlin)](https://www.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/de/professuren/bwl/marketing/studium). For students who are writing a seminar paper or thesis at the Marketing Institute, we also offer additional material for self-study ([Introduction to Scientific Work](https://www.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/de/professuren/bwl/marketing/studium/ba-studiengaenge/709002-einfuehrung-in-das-wissenschaftliche-arbeiten-020922-1.pdf)).

### Bachelor

-   Market Research and Marketing Decisions ([lecture, summer term](https://www.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/de/professuren/bwl/marketing/studium/ba-studiengaenge/syllabus-mfme-sose-2024-70687.pdf))
-   Consumer Behavior ([lecture, winter term](https://www.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/de/professuren/bwl/marketing/studium/ba-studiengaenge/konsumentenverhalten-707100-ws-25_26.pdf))
-   Marketing Management ([seminar, winter term](https://www.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/de/professuren/bwl/marketing/studium/ba-studiengaenge/seminar-zum-marketingmanagement-70708-ws-25_26.pdf))
-   Thesis Seminar ([seminar, each semester](https://www.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/de/professuren/bwl/marketing/studium/ba-studiengaenge/studienabschlussseminar-marketing_konsumentenverhalten-709001-ws-25_26.pdf))
